home.title: Secure Multi-Level Test Platform
home.subtitle: Experience the future of online testing with advanced security features, multi-level assessments, and comprehensive analytics.

security.title: Advanced Security
security.description: Anti-cheat measures including fullscreen mode, tab switching detection, and single-device login restrictions ensure test integrity.

levels.title: Multi-Level Testing
levels.description: Three progressive difficulty levels with admin-controlled access, allowing structured learning paths and skill assessment.

analytics.title: Comprehensive Analytics
analytics.description: Detailed performance tracking, progress monitoring, and statistical analysis for both students and administrators.

modes.title: Flexible Test Modes
modes.description: Choose from questions 1-45, 46-90, or full practice tests to customize your learning experience.

management.title: User Management
management.description: Admin-controlled user creation, level access management, and device session monitoring for complete control.

languages.title: Multi-Language Support
languages.description: Available in English, Russian, and Uzbek languages to serve diverse user communities globally.

cta.title: Ready to Transform Your Testing Experience?
cta.subtitle: Join thousands of users who trust our secure and comprehensive testing platform.

login.title: Test Platform
login.subtitle: Secure Multi-Level Test Solving Platform
login.deviceRestriction: Account is already logged in on another device
login.adminOnly: Accounts are created by administrators only
login.contactAdmin: Please contact your admin for access

dashboard.levelDescription: Select a test level to begin your assessment

test.question: Question {current}/{total}
test.warning: Warning {count}/3: Do not switch tabs or leave fullscreen! Test will be auto-submitted.

results.title: Test Results
results.subtitle: Here's how you performed
results.keepPracticing: Keep practicing! You can do better!
